## Alternative Viewing Options

If the embedded presentation doesn't load properly, you can:

1. **Open in new tab**: [View presentation in Google Slides →](https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/14ORJ0Md2fVQcDtKs-64JE4Ku8pAqvSKJ/edit?usp=sharing)

2. **Download**: Click the link above, then go to File → Download → Microsoft PowerPoint (.pptx)

3. **Present mode**: Click the link above and press the "Present" button in Google Slides for full-screen mode
:::
